name: Save your eyes
description:
Sets larger and resolution-independent font size (mostly 12pt - may depend on font typeface) and maximum paragraph width (35-40em) in _article_area_only_ on many sites I read. Trying not to break page layout. Simple zooming and No Squint extension make pages looking ugly (backgrounds don't fit and divs jump down - it's sick) and requires turning mouse wheel on every computer you sit before at every site once again. I'm lazy and like doing jobs only once. You too, suppose...
Frequently updated - stay tuned. If you think any style need to be refined, feel free to contact me: xmpp:  wodzu at wodzu.net.

discussions.name: very nice. make it all grey and you got a winner ;
